responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "BC6D9E654E2756AC88B30391A406CCF3", "Our main goal is to reach and secure Hammer Rest, a larger settlement we\'re trying to establish further in. But the direct route, the Old King\'s Road, is becoming a chokepoint. Gretta Ironhand, one of our sharpest, has established a forward observation post ? \'Gritstone Overwatch\' ? along that road. She just sent word: a large number of these Clay Dwarves are gathering near her, showing a new level of aggression and... organization. She needs support, urgently. Get to her. She\'ll know how to direct you.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_GatewatcherStonebeard_12_Response
